snippet.title: Niche - Original Trailer
snippet.description:
Niche – a genetics survival game is a turn-based strategy game combined with simulation and survival elements for PC, Mac and Linux. Shape your own species of animals based on real genetics. Keep your species alive against all odds, such as predators, climate change and spreading sickness.

http://niche-game.com/
